snippet.title: Swift: Youtube - Custom Tab Bar / Menu Bar using UICollectionView (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
Welcome back fellow App Builders.  We're making solid progress on the YouTube app so lets continue by creating the custom MenuBar that is anchored below our navigation bar.  Instead of using a UISegmentedControl like you'd might expect, we're going to create this component using a UICollectionView.  Sit back, enjoy, and have some fun learning today.

Part 1 - Building the Home Feed: https://youtu.be/3Xv1mJvwXok
Part 2 - Assets and Cell Sizing: https://youtu.be/APQVltARKF8

Completed Source Code:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=66

Twitter Slide Out Menu Course
